alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 7:35PM CDT until June 05 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Central Kansas, including the following county, Russell. * WHEN...Until 145 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 734 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This rainfall has occurred in a short period of time and will cause localized flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Russell, Lucas, Gorham, Luray, Dorrance, Milberger, Bunker Hill, Paradise, Waldo, Russell Airport, Wilson Lake and Wilson State Park.
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown.
